page.title: 04Paul's Manifesto For Newark
page.content: These are the things I would like to improve in Newark. I would improve the toilets especially on Sconce Hills, they are never open. The reason they get closed is because people spray paint inside. Break dancing should have a spot in Newark with mats and everything instead of on the street. It would be good to have a hall to break dance in, because the clubs could get together and practice. There could be a swimming pool next door, so that everyone could have a swim after dancing. If the young people had these things to do they would not have time to waste writing on toilet walls.
